snippet: Returning to tennis for the first time since becoming a father, Andy Murray will lead Britain's Davis Cup team when it opens the defense of its title against Japan next week....
lead_paragraph: Returning to tennis for the first time since becoming a father, Andy Murray will lead Britain's Davis Cup team when it opens the defense of its title against Japan next week.

headline.print_headline: Andy Murray to Return From Fatherhood in Davis Cup
headline.main: Andy Murray to Return From Fatherhood in Davis Cup
